text: Tangada dauwa aamua Assyria ga duudagi adu, “Be goodou ga hagi mai bolo goodou e gana gi Dimaadua di godou God? Ma go nia gowaa dugu mee dabuaahia mono gowaa dudu tigidaumaha a Dimaadua ala ne oho gi daha go Hezekiah i di madagoaa o mee ne hagi anga gi nia daangada o Judah mo Jerusalem bolo gi daumaha gi di gowaa dudu tigidaumaha hua e dahi.
